p: Pneumonia was the main complication occurring in 63.9% (829) SHLCI cases, 48.1% (382) of which presented bacterial coinfection. Acute respiratory distress syndrome accounted for 46% (596) and multiorganic failure for 7.3% (95) cases. Five influenza associated encephalitis occurred unvaccinated SHLCI patients aged 42-to 67 years old. Three were caused by IVB and 2 by IVA (1 A(H1N1)pdm09 and 1 not subtyped).
